protein.specific_function: Exhibits glutathione-dependent thiol transferase activity. Has high dehydroascorbate reductase activity and may contribute to the recycling of ascorbic acid. Participates in the biotransformation of inorganic arsenic and reduces monomethylarsonic acid (MMA).

pathway.name: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring alkyl or aryl (other than methyl) groups
